newsletterData.image: /assets/images of newsletter-knowledge resources/Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter – December 2018.jpg
newsletterData.heading: Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter
newsletterData.summary: Wishing everyone a prosperous year ahead. Read Asha Impact's newsletter to get a glimpse of the major events of 2018. Asha Impact and Jindal Centre for Social Innovation + Entrepreneurship have launched India's first 4-week online course on the impact investment industry. The course captures insights from top impact investors including Michael and Susan Dell Foundation, Aavishkaar, Omidyar Network, Northern Arc, Leapfrog, Acumen, Aspada, and many more.

newsletterData.image: /assets/images of newsletter-knowledge resources/Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter – October 2018.jpg
newsletterData.heading: Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter
newsletterData.summary: Attend the Global Steering Group's Impact Summit where Asha Impact founders Vikram Gandhi and Pramod Bhasin, along with 900 global impact investment leaders, discuss key actions to take the industry to a global tipping point by 2020. Join Asha Impact at the Indian Impact Council's flagship LP-GP conference — Prabhav — to explore collaborations for achieving the Sustainable Development Goals.

newsletterData.image: /assets/images of newsletter-knowledge resources/Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter – June 2018.jpg
newsletterData.heading: Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter
newsletterData.summary: Asha Impact clocked its first exit from Varthana, a Bengaluru-based lender to affordable private schools impacting 2 million students across 3,500 schools. NEPRA - Let's Recycle, a waste management company, raised $6.5 million in its Series B funding round from Asha Impact and Aavishkaar. Market analysis shows around 19 deals worth ~$190 million this quarter, with major Series-B/C investments in Financial Services and Agriculture companies.

newsletterData.image: /assets/images of newsletter-knowledge resources/Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter – March 2018.jpg
newsletterData.heading: Asha Impact Quarterly Newsletter
newsletterData.summary: The first edition of the Asha Impact quarterly newsletter brings the latest news from the impact investment sector—top deals, pioneering research, and key events. According to Asha Impact's bottom-up analysis, FY18 saw about 60 deals worth ₹720 crore, with significant Series-A activity in Financial Services and Agriculture, and early-stage activity in Education, Energy Access, Healthcare, and Technology for Development.
